CDT uses the following third party libaries: * javax.units which is available under the BSD license at http://jsr-108.sourceforge.net/ * jscience which is available under the BSD license at http://java.net/projects/jscience/
CDT also uses some icons from fugue icons © 2012 Yusuke Kamiyamane. All rights reserved. which is available under the Creative Commons BY 3.0 license at http://p.yusukekamiyamane.com/
